msbt.message: So the moon's got its own calendar, and that's why Lunar New Year is on a different day every year? Not sure why I need to know that, since I ain't likely to be spendin' much time up on the moon
In some parts of the world, this Lunar New Year thing's all about havin' big family get-togethers.Speaking of, wonder how Mom's doin'? Reckon I owe her a call.
So it's Lunar New Year, huh?<10_4 /> Reckon I might celebrate with a plate of beans and a nice, long nap
Not sure how to go about celebratin' this Lunar New Year, but I reckon someone around here's gotta know.If there's one thing we're good at here on this island, , it's throwin' parties!
Accordin' to the moon's calendar, today's another New Year, so we got an extra holiday to celebrate!
